name: COLLIDER CRAFTCROSS
description:
Yo guys, I hope you enjoy our game, because we tried pretty hard, a lot of sleepless nights, periods of discouragement - all so that, Dummy could ride a motorcycle!

We don't plan to stop at this point, and we want to add a full race mode, so stay tuned!

Our team: Jimvw#0115 - design, video edit and game soundtrack.

Nagoya#4817 - 3d artist and main developer. (Somewhere in the game are hidden cookies!)

Code repository:   https://github.com/Frankfurt123/Collider-CraftCross

VT check: https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/730b56a4679705ff0d9052146b813021cbc56a572595eaf04421bd63974260d0?nocache=1
